offers for both NFTs (instant transfer) and off-chain assets (via escrow) Features: - Make offer on any listing (below/above asking price) - Multiple simultaneous offers per listing - Time-limited offers with expiration - Seller can accept/reject offers - Buyer can cancel active offers - Automatic routing: NFT = instant transfer, others = escrow creation - Locked funds when offer made (ensures buyer has funds)","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not acceptOffer(uint256).details: Triggers asset transfer (NFT instant, others create escrow)

batchCancelOffers(uint256[]).details: Useful for buyer to cancel multiple offers at once

cancelOffer(uint256).details: Can only cancel active, non-accepted offers

claimExpiredOffer(uint256).details: Anyone can call to clean up expired offers

claimFailedRefund(uint256).details: This allows buyers to manually claim refunds when automatic transfer failsCommon scenarios: buyer is a contract that reverts, or has high gas requirements

claimRefundForInvalidOffer(uint256).details: Allows buyers to claim refunds when their offer becomes invalid

makeOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Offer amount is msg.value, funds are locked in contract

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

buyerOffers(address,uint256).notice: Mapping buyer => array of offer IDs

claimFailedRefund(uint256).notice: Claim refund for an offer where automatic refund failed

claimRefundForInvalidOffer(uint256).notice: Claim refund for offer on sold/cancelled listing

listingOffers(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping listingId => array of offer IDs

makeOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Make an offer on a listing

offerRefundAvailable(uint256).notice: Mapping offer ID => whether refund is available for claim

offers(uint256).notice: Mapping from offer ID to offer data

sellerOffers(address,uint256).notice: Mapping seller => array of offer IDs
